Description: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

Title: The Straight Story
Actors: Sissy Spacek, Jane Galloway Heitz, Joseph A. Carpenter, Donald Wiegert
Description: An old man makes a long journey by lawn-mover tractor to mend his relationship with an ill brother.

Title: Slumdog Millionaire
Actors: Dev Patel, Saurabh Shukla, Anil Kapoor, Raj Zutshi
Description: A Mumbai teen reflects on his upbringing in the slums when he is accused of cheating on the Indian Version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?"
